description: This source file implements utility functions for the SLAP (Service Logic Aggregation Plane) Loam Client component, including functions for translating messages, translating objects between LOA and LPC environments, and converting parameter lists and variables between LOA and UOA formats.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLpcToLoaImcpInvoAnswer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,void * pImcpAnswer)
methods.description: Translates an IMCP SLAP_INVO_ANSWER message into internal representation, including object type and name extraction, and object import.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapLcoLpcToLoaSlapObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE obj_handle,ULONG obj_type,char * obj_name,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * import_param_list)
methods.description: Translates a SLAP object from LPC handle to LOA handle, invoking necessary remote procedures to get object info.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaToLpcImcpInvoCall(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,void * pImcpCall)
methods.description: Translates an IMCP SLAP_INVO_CALL message, converting SLAP object references from LOA to LPC form.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapLcoLoaToLpcSlapObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE obj_handle)
methods.description: Converts a LOA object handle to an LPC object handle, possibly exporting the LOA object back to LPC.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaToUoaParamList(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list)
methods.description: Converts a parameter list from LOA format to UOA format by translating each variable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoUoaToLoaParamList(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list)
methods.description: Converts a parameter list from UOA format to LOA format by translating each variable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaToUoaVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_VARIABLE * slap_var)
methods.description: Converts a LOA variable to UOA format, handling object handles based on the object mode.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoUoaToLoaVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_VARIABLE * slap_var)
methods.description: Converts a UOA variable to LOA format, creating local object agents or converting object handles as needed.

ctags.name: SlapLcoLpcToLoaSlapObject
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE obj_handle,ULONG obj_type,char * obj_name,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * import_param_list)
